xxl.core.indexStructures
Class XTree.IndexEntry

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.indexStructures.Tree.IndexEntry
      xxl.core.indexStructures.ORTree.IndexEntry
          xxl.core.indexStructures.XTree.IndexEntry
Enclosing class:
XTree
public class XTree.IndexEntry
extends ORTree.IndexEntry

This class describes the index entries (i.e. the entries of the non-leaf nodes) of a x-tree. Each index entry refers to a node which is the root of the subtree. We call this node the subnode of the index entry.

See Also:
ORTree.IndexEntry
